subject: Question about materials
description_text:
Goodmorning,
I would ask 2 questions about Simsonn GT2 steering wheel:
- is it available in alcantara materials? 
- do you ship also in Italy? How much is it?

Thanks so much,
Regards
Andrea 

Inviato da iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Andrea Manfredi,    You can take a look at this steering wheelâ€”it's made of suede. We can ship to Italy without any customs duties or other fees.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-simulator-steering-wheel-s1?variant=50349670498618
